As a parent of children with autism and other disabilities I'm noticing alot of pages been created on Facebook to preach hate against autism, cerebral palsy, down syndrome and other disabilities, and I want the government and social media sites to be very strict on this happening, it seems more and more people trying to "wipe" these conditions out and trying to make other people join in the hate preaching
The latest one is a page on Facebook to exterminate all autistics  and how us westerners are pieces of **** and how we should kill our autistic children
This person should be brought to justice for this and for all hate preaching pages to be pulled straight away and pages on Facebook vetted before being allowed to go public
